name: Put a Pin In It
description:
Producing smart grenades is a hard job.

You know, some are duds and some just happen to go sentient.

You could probably improve the design.

Or you just hire someone to defuse the ones that become alive.


That's the job you have. "It's really simple" they told you, forgetting to mention any of the risks. "Just put the pin back into the grenade". It's a shame that you have some issues controlling your hands. Lets just hope you can keep it going for a while.

Controls

Move hand with your mouse.
Use the scrollwheel to move hand up and down.
Hover a pin with your index finger to put it on your finger.
Drop pins back into grenades to defuse them.

Couldn't be simpler, right?

Credits

Made as a gift for my brother's birthday in 2018. He had recently finished his military service which inspired this game.

Known issues

Grenades can fly outside the box making it impossible to reach them.

Occasionally the physics can go a bit wonky and freak out, especially with the hand. Sadly nothing you can do but fail and restart.
